alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 11 at 2:16AM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 10-12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin and South Laramie Range Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range
